posts.post_title: Need American Beauty and Hindu showing Cleveland player
posts.post_content: I am trying to get Goode, Birmingham, or Rhoades with arm extended  in PSA 5 ( or SGC equal) or lower that have American Beauty ( both framed and unframed) and Hindu back. LMK if you have something. Thanks.
